message: Installed pre-commit hook running 'cargo clippy -- -D warnings'
Bundled templates in flake.nix; nix build succeeded earlier
Started wrapping ralph binary in flake.nix
Wrapped ralph with RALPH_SHARE_DIR in flake.nix
Init reads templates from RALPH_SHARE_DIR when set; embedded fallback used when unset; error on missing files in share dir
Init detects git root and copies agent files to git root/.github/agents; errors if not in a git repo
Skipped existing agent files without error; verbose mode may indicate skipped files
Printed success message after init; idempotent when files skipped
